title: home solar installations
texts: Your best option for power. Building a new home? We can work with your contractors to get a system installed alongside construction. Or if you have a home and want to add panels to your roof, we’ve got you covered.
We know power isn’t cheap on Big Island, let us help reduce those expensive bills with a system that will quickly pay for itself.
We have experience with large and small installs, adding to existing systems, and on and off-grid systems - this is where Regis Electric shines.

title: home automation systems
texts: For homeowners who want to command their home whether they are from the touch of a few buttons.
